text: Zendaya made her American Vogue cover debut today for the magazine's July 2017 issue. In the photo, the Spider - Man : Homecoming actress wears a black - and - white feathered dress from Calvin Klein's most recent fall collection. Her make - up, done by the legendary Diane Kendal, showcases her flawless complexion and features a sultry, smoky eye and pinkish - nude lip - a look that somehow reads both timeless and fresh. Hairstylist Shay Ashual pulled the Oakland native's strands back and gave her a set of faux, thick bangs, reinforcing a style that is well on its way to becoming the biggest trend of the season.
